1.text: In these days John the Baptist is present, proclaiming in the desert of Judea;

2.text: And saying, Repent, for the kingdom of the heavens has drawn near.

3.text: For this is he spoken of by the prophet Esaias, saying, A voice of him crying in the desert, Prepare the way of the Lord; make his paths straight.

4.text: And this John had his garment from camelâ€™s hair, and a leather girdle about his loins, and his food was locusts and wild honey.

5.text: Then went out to him Jerusalem, and all Judea, and all round about Jordan;

6.text: And they were immersed in Jordan by him, acknowledging their sins.

7.text: And seeing many of the Pharisees and Sadducees coming to his immersion, he said to them, O generation of vipers, who has indicated to you to flee from the wrath about to come?

8.text: Do ye therefore fruit worthy of repentance.

9.text: And think not to say in yourselves we have Abraham a father; for I say to you, that God can of these stones raise up children to Abraham.

10.text: And now also the axe lies at the root of the trees; therefore every one not making good fruit is cut off and cast into fire.

11.text: I truly immerse you in water to repentance; but he coming after me is stronger than I, whose shoes I am not fit to lift up; he shall immerse in the Holy Spirit, and fire.

12.text: Whose winnowing fan is in his hand, and he will thoroughly cleanse his threshing floor, and gather his wheat into the store; but he will burn down the chaff in inextinguishable fire.

13.text: Then Jesus approaches from Galilee to Jordan, to John, to be immersed by him.

14.text: And John hindered him, saying, I have need to be immersed by thee, and dost thou come to me?

15.text: And Jesus having answered said to him, Permit now; for so it is suitable for us to complete all justice: then he permitted him.

16.text: And Jesus, having been immersed, went up straight from the water, and, behold, the heavens were opened to him, and he saw the Spirit of God descending as a dove, and coming upon him.

17.text: And behold a voice from the heavens, saying, This is my dearly beloved Son, in whom I was contented.
